traits.Keen Sight and Smell: The raven has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.
traits.Pack Tactics: The raven has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raven's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.Multiattack: The raven makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Talons: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.
